title: Why is Hecarim not in the Arcade login screen?
body: ^ No Hecarim in the login screen. Good job Rito you took off Hecarim.

replies.body:
< 7 months late XD >
Hello, I'm a Rioter who was one of the animators for this screen! We decided to leave out Hecarim and Veigar due to both space (didn't want to cram his eyes into a point that would be largely covered anyways), and time (we had to do this fast considering everything going on!). We decided to focus on the new skins and focal area the most.

Also, Hecarim going sideways might feel strange when we consider how the background moves forward so fast, as zzman mentioned!

Let me know if you have any more questions about this! Sorry for the lateness, but I figured I should try to be more active on the boards recently, so here I am making up for lost time  :)

Thank you!
He is the Waves of light rushing in the backgrounds, too fast to see.
